topic.title: CIS241 Week 1 assignments due date postponed to Oct 2, 2017 Monday
topic.text:
The due dates of CIS241 Week 1 assignments are postponed to Oct 2, 2017 Monday (from Sept 25, 2017), to give students more time to set up the online CIW curriculum.:

Activities
     Login to CIW curriculum and link to your Instructor
Labs
    Site Development Associate Pre-assessment
Discussions
    Week 1 - Introduce Yourself
Quizzes
    Site Development Associate Pre-assessment Survey

 

Louis,   9/20/2017
